## colorManipulator.decomposeColor() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

### colorManipulator.decomposeColor() function

Returns an object with the type and values of a color.

Note: Does not support rgb % values.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function decomposeColor(color: string | DecomposeColor): DecomposeColor;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { colorManipulator } from '@grafana/data';
const { decomposeColor } = colorManipulator;
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  color | <code>string &#124; DecomposeColor</code> | CSS color, i.e. one of: \#nnn, \#nnnnnn, rgb(), rgba(), hsl(), hsla() |

<b>Returns:</b>

`DecomposeColor`

{<!-- -->object<!-- -->} - A MUI color object: {<!-- -->type: string, values: number\[\]<!-- -->}
